messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Digest Number 3794
messages.msgSnippet: on 7/3/03 10:59 PM, Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com at ... We pretty much gave up doing after school work - it was too terrible. Even though I knew the
messages.messageBody:
on 7/3/03 10:59 PM, Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> My problem is that where I am teaching now it is an afterschool program and
> the majority of kids there are put there (like it or not) by working parents.


We pretty much gave up doing after school work - it was too terrible. Even
though I knew the kids would have fun once they knew what to do, it was too
hard to get them to even listen to the first ideas. I felt bad because I
knew what they had been through all day.

After school programs should be running around and screaming or watching
movies <gg>.

Paula
